sense.gloss: to lay in stock, to replenish stock, to procure
to learn, to find out, to take in

sdata.j: この↑無限↑↓むげん↓の↑空間↑↓くうかん↓に↑漂↑↓ただよ↓う↑永遠↑↓えいえん↓の↑沈黙↑↓ちんもく↓が↑私↑↓わたし↓を↑恐怖↑↓きょうふ↓に↑陥↑↓おと|しい↓れる|。
sdata.e: The eternal silence of these infinite spaces terrifies me.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓これ？オムライスに↑精子↑↓せい|し↓↑入↑↓い↓れる|なんて，↑信↑↓しん↓じられない！
sdata.e: What the hell is this? I can't believe you put sperm in the Omelette Rice.
